Baya | Full stack, smart contract | New York / SF | REMOTE | Full-time

Baya is organizing a coalition of technology and real estate companies to create the largest aggregate data source for commercial real estate. The platform will enable the industry to build new applications drawing from Baya's extensive data set of listings, comps, property information, and market trends.

We've secured partnerships and funding, and are looking for experienced Ethereum developers to join in architecting and implementing the system, and full-stack Ruby on Rails developers to build clients against it.

We have a great, no-nonsense working style and a distributed team, with offices in New York and San Francisco.

Contact me at ben@baya.io, or see more at our listings here: https://boards.greenhouse.io/bayanetwork
